nodes.text: Cornevero Dawlton was a merchant who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Cornevero Dawlton was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.

Because Cornevero Dawlton spawned under the generic "commoner" template, Dawlton's appearance was randomized under one of a 120 possible depictions. Species Dawlton could appear as included Aqualish, Bothans, Bith, Humans, Nikto, Rodians, Sullustans, Trandoshans, Twi'leks, and Zabrak under either gender, and male Devaronians and male Ishi Tib. Because the quest dialogue made no mention of Dawlton's physical characteristics, the canonical species and gender cannot be definitively determined in the Star Wars Legends continuity.
